title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.1 - General information

State Regulations
(a) This

Part (this Part or this rule) provides the regulations for types of assistance, eligibility requirements, evaluation criteria, terms and conditions, the
application process and procedures and other aspects of administration of The

Empire State Economic Development Fund Program (the program). The program
provides assistance for projects that promote the economic health of New York

State (the State) by facilitating the creation or retention of jobs or the
increase of business activity in the State. The program is authorized under
section 16-i of the New York State Urban Development Corporation Act (the act); reference should be made to such section for various applicable sunset
provisions which from time to time may revoke the effectiveness of section 16-i
and certain of its provisions. (b) The program provides the following types of assistance: (1)

General development financing (see
sections
4243.9
through and including
4243.12 of this Part). (2)

Federal
and urban site development financing (see sections
4243.13
through and including
4243.16 of this Part). (3)

Competitiveness Improvement Program (see sections
4243.17
and
4243.18
of this Part). (4)

Infrastructure development financing (see
sections
4243.20
through and including
4243.23 of this Part). (5)

Regional
and economic industrial planning studies and economic development initiatives
(see sections
4243.24
through and including
4243.27 of this Part). (6)

Commercial area development financing (see sections
4243.28
through and including
4243.31 of this Part). (7)

Capital
access (see sections
4243.32
through and including
4243.35 of this Part). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
